about_the_game:
"Fantastic Chivalry·Interwoven fates" is a stand-alone immortal Xia game independently developed by Mengchen, derived from his series of "Chivalry and Miracles" (under development).
I have seen many tragedies, and I always wonder why there is no perfect ending, even if it will cost me a lot. So the work was born - at the moment when the players experienced the destruction of tragedy, they were endowed with the ability to change the tragedy.
The game describes the stories from many different characters in different time and space: "Youbao Fantasy" with treasure hunting adventure, "Luohua Fantasy" with pity love, "Huaxian Fantasy" with fairyland adventure, and "the smoke of war" with war marriage
The IF ending of the game: The protagonists accidentally discover the space-time secrets recorded in the "Stone of Miracles", understand the origin of magic, the birth of illusion, learn the method of returning to dreams, and interact with each other to make up for the regret and change the ending.

======Introduction to Play======
[touching story]
The game has carefully prepared many moving story chapters from different angles (time and space), and is equipped with the whole process voice. Each story has its own protagonist. Multiple perspectives, restore the attributes of Xianxia world.
[Set Collection]
Players can collect equipment sets in the game to make equipment play a greater role.
[Soul Enhancement]
After a battle, you can obtain the spirit of a monster and integrate it into the weapon to enhance the effect.
[Attribute restriction]
The attributes of yin, yang and five elements mutually reinforce and neutralize each other, which may affect the outcome of the battle.
[Equip with additional spells]
You can collect spells with different attributes in the game, and use the additional weapons to make it get the effect of spells.
[New game rebirth]
The game is configured with multi eye reincarnation. You can use strange stones to go back and forth between stories, use the dream returning magic, travel through time and space, and try to rewrite the ending!
[CTB system battle]
The action sequence and action strip system make the traditional round system more strategic.
……

======Game Background======
In the ancient times, when chaos began to unfold, Nuwa, the god of heaven, collected five colored spiritual stones to fill many "gaps in the sky", but still left many small "gaps in the sky". This secret was recorded by a strange man on a piece of stone called "Mirage Stone". It is said that the power of the stone can open the "sky gap" and travel through another "time and space" (story).
Have you ever experienced in the story - an irretrievable and very emotional sad story? Or do you want to bring together different characters and stories to create new stories?
Quickly open the chapter of Fantasy Hero · Fairy Destiny, which is a collection of "The Story of Sky Gap", let the classic continue, let the power of fantasy continue to change time and space, shuttle time and space, and create a new history!!
